Action.name: Action
Action.description: You can use ApexPages.Action to create an action method that you can use in a Visualforce custom controller or controller extension.

Component.name: Component
Component.description: Represents a dynamic Visualforce component in Apex.

IdeaStandardController.name: IdeaStandardController
IdeaStandardController.description: IdeaStandardController objects offer Ideas-specific functionality in addition to what is provided by the StandardController.

IdeaStandardSetController.name: IdeaStandardSetController
IdeaStandardSetController.description: IdeaStandardSetController objects offer Ideas-specific functionality in addition to what is provided by the StandardSetController.

KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardControlle.name: KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardController
KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardControlle.description: KnowledgeArticleVersionStandardController objects offer article-specific functionality in addition to what is provided by the StandardController.

Message.name: Message
Message.description: Contains validation errors that occur when the end user saves the page when using a standard controller.

StandardController.name: StandardController
StandardController.description: Use a StandardController when defining an extension for a standard controller.

StandardSetController.name: StandardSetController
StandardSetController.description: StandardSetController objects allow you to create list controllers similar to, or as extensions of, the pre-built Visualforce list controllers provided by Salesforce.
